fixes.name: Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs
fixes.dax_expression: ABS( SUM( 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)] ) )
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau calculated field abs(SUM([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)])) into a DAX measure using ABS and SUM.

fixes.name: BATCH
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR numerator = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs]
VAR denom = CALCULATE( 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs], ALL('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)') )
RETURN DIVIDE(numerator, denom)
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau expression dividing a value by TOTAL(value). TOTAL (a table calculation) is implemented in DAX by calculating the expression with ALL(...) to remove filters, so the expression is created as a measure.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation uses the Tableau table calculation TOTAL, which is a table/window-level aggregation; such logic must be implemented as a measure in Power BI.
